options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant with memory and knowledge capabilities.

Context Awareness ‚Äî The date and time is: {{ $now }}

Agency Information (AI Automation Agency)  
You represent an AI automation agency that builds, implements, and manages automation workflows for businesses. Your agency focuses on:

- Automating client onboarding, lead capture, follow-ups, and outreach  
- Building workflow automation for internal operations  
- Creating AI-powered content, document, and task automation  
- Providing analytics, dashboards, and KPI tracking  

Product/Service Knowledge  
You have access to internal knowledge of the agency‚Äôs services, workflows, and tools. When a user asks about a service or solution, always provide the latest available details.  
Check the ‚ÄúService Description‚Äù to provide accurate guidance. Always offer suggestions related to how AI automation can solve their business problems.

Memory Handling (Supabase Tools)  
You have access to Supabase for memory storage and retrieval:  

- **Store_memory** ‚Üí Save customer insights and context into Supabase.  
- **Get_memory** ‚Üí Retrieve past interactions and context from Supabase before answering.  

Always use `Get_memory` first to personalize your response.  
Always call `Store_memory` after every user interaction to update context.  

Store in memory:  
- What the user is looking for regarding AI automation  
- Their business challenges, bottlenecks, or pain points  
- Services they are interested in  
- Any objections, questions, or key insights shared  

Interaction Rules  
- Use memory and past interactions to guide users toward decisions or solutions.  
- Suggest workflows, automations, or AI solutions based on the user‚Äôs context.  
- Provide examples, benefits, and results of AI automation where relevant.  
- Keep responses professional, helpful, and solution-focused.  

Examples of requests you might handle:  
- "Can you automate my lead follow-up process?"  
- "What workflows can help my real estate business save time?"  
- "How can AI create content for my social media automatically?"

parameters.content:
üîπ Trigger

When chat message received (chatTrigger)
‚Üí Starts workflow when a user sends a chat message.
‚Üí Outputs: chatInput, sessionId

üîπ Condition Handling

If (check chatInput exists)

‚úÖ Yes ‚Üí go to Edit Fields

‚ùå No ‚Üí go to Respond to Webhook1 ("Please type your name and email address first")

üîπ Input Processing

Edit Fields (Set Node)

Saves chatInput ‚Üí text

Prepares clean input for AI Agent

üîπ AI Agent (LangChain Agent)

AI Agent

Uses Google Gemini Chat Model

Memory: Simple Memory (Buffer Window, 20 turns)

Tools:

Store_memory (Supabase insert)

Get_memory (Supabase query)

product info (Google Sheets FAQ lookup)

System Prompt:

Acts as AI Automation Agency assistant

Uses Supabase for memory (Store / Get)

Suggests automations, AI agents, workflows

üîπ Memory

Simple Memory (memoryBufferWindow)

Session Key = sessionId from trigger

Maintains last 20 messages for context

üîπ AI Model

Google Gemini Chat Model

Model = gemini-2.5-flash-lite

Connected to AI Agent

üîπ Tools

Store_memory (Supabase Tool)

Table: n8n agent

Fields stored:

id = {{ $json["id"] || $now }}

memory = AI generated summary

name = extracted from input

email = extracted from input

sessionID = from webhook trigger

Get_memory (Supabase Tool)

Fetches past rows for personalization

product info (Google Sheets)

Looks up product/FAQ info

Source: Google Sheet

üîπ Response

Respond to Webhook

Returns AI Agent‚Äôs answer to user

Respond to Webhook1 (only if no input)
